name: demo-html5-tinymce6
description: A simple html5 App integrating WIRIS MathType in a TinyMCE6 rich text editor.

scripts.start-remote: yarn && yarn unlink @wiris/mathtype-tinymce6 && yarn unlink @wiris/mathtype-html-integration-devkit && yarn install --force

author: WIRIS Team (https://www.wiris.com)
